titleStmt.title: The poeticall essayes of Alexander Craige Scotobritane Seene and allowed.
titleStmt.author: Craig, Alexander, 1567?-1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: By William White, dwelling in Cow-lane neere Holborne Conduit,

notesStmt.note: The last leaf contains Latin verses addressed to the author by Robert Ayton and Arthur Gordon.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
